metadata.title: Mariell Rose Gold Vintage Ivory Glass Pearl & Crystal Stretch Bracelet - 6-Row Art Deco Bridal Jewelry
features: Mariell's Best-Selling Rose Gold plated Simulated Ivory Pearl Bracelet with Crystal Accents; Perfect Vintage Wedding Style for Brides, Bridesmaids or Evening Wear; Also Great Rose Gold Bracelet for Everyday Fashion Jewelry for Casual and Business Wear
Comfortable 6-Row Stretch Bracelet; 5mm Glass-Based Shell Pearls; Decorative Art Deco Design Motif Plated in 14K Rose Gold; Fits Most Wrist Sizes from 6" - 7 1/4"
Gorgeous Antique Reproduction Blush Gold Pave Art Deco Etched Design measures 1 1/4" high x 3/4" w; Jewel Encrusted with Fine Quality European Crystals Set in Blush Gold
Designed, Manufactured and Packaged by Mariell, a USA-Based Woman Owned Company
Beautifully Packaged in Luxurious Embossed Mariell Designs Black Kraft Gift Box
description: Mariell's 6-row simulated ivory pearl bracelet has a beautifully etched Genuine Rose Gold plated vintage design glistening with Genuine European crystals. The decorative jewel-encrusted motif measures 1 1/4" high x 3/4" w and evokes the romance and charm of Art Deco heirlooms. Our top-selling bridal stretch bracelet flaunts 6-strands of 5mm glass-based shell pearls, perfect to accessorize your wedding gown or special occasion frocks. We can't resist the dress up or dress down versatility of this stunning cream pearl bracelet. Whether you're walking down the aisle, accessorizing your business wardrobe or adding a splash of glamour to jeans and a sweater, this fashionable statement piece will make a fabulous addition to your jewelry collection. At an incredibly affordable price, our ivory pearl bracelet is also the perfect choice for bridesmaids gifts, birthdays, anniversaries, holidays or 'just because'. With its stretch design, one size fits most makes this a great gift item as it takes the guess-work out of sizing. We promise you'll love this best-selling Antique Reproduction statement piece. Treat yourself or someone you love to some seriously gorgeous Blush Gold vintage sparkle.
